text: garaz ibaraaheem kee qaum ke paas (in baaton ka) isake siva koee javaab na tha ki baaham kahane lage isako maar daalo ya jala (kar khaak) kar daalo (aakhir vah kar guzare) to khuda ne unako aag se bacha liya isamen shak nahin ki duniyaadaar logon ke vaaste is vaakiye mein (kudarate khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
